heading.title: PMP Certification
heading.description: PMP® Certification pathway from CertScope will help you to understand PMP process groups and Knowledge areas as per updated PMBOK edition and assist in passing the Project Management Professional® exam in the first attempt.

certification_overview.title: Multiple delivery options
certification_overview.description: Delivery Options: Self Paced | Instructor-led Live Online | Traditional classroom.

certification_overview.title: Course completion certificate
certification_overview.description: 35 contact hour certificate will be issued after successful completion of the training.

certification_overview.title: Case studies
certification_overview.description: Seven (07) Industry Case Studies with more than 15 industry based scenarios.

certification_overview.title: Hands-on projects and practice tests
certification_overview.description: Five (05) hands-on projects and access to five (05) practice tests with 200 questions each.

Classroom.title: CLASSROOM
list: Three simulation practice tests of 200 questions each

Live_online.title: LIVE ONLINE
list: Soft copy of the course material
Three simulation practice tests of 200 questions each

steps.label: Qualified mentor equals insightful mentee
steps.description: Our PMP training boot camps are delivered by PMP certified professionals with more than 15 years of relevant industry experience. They are experts who know what they teach and preach.

steps.label: Case studies and practical assignments
steps.description: Learn the various concepts of A Guide to the Project Management Body of Knowledge (PMBOK® Guide) with the help of practical assignments and industry case studies.

steps.label: Hands on mentor-ship
steps.description: The mentor will determine your readiness for the examination and will assess the areas of your strengths and weakness. The trainer will guide you through the simulation examination and assist you in answering the long scenario-based questions. Those questions are based on the standards set by previous examinations.

steps.label: Guidance with examination
steps.description: Our training curriculum is based on PMI's latest version of A Guide to the Project Management Body of Knowledge (PMBOK® Guide). This guide includes 14 chapters. On successful completion of the training, our certification team will guide you through the certification process. We do stay till the end to see you succeed.

Enterprise_Solutions.title: Learning delivery model as per your organisational requirements
Enterprise-grade Learning Management System (LMS), dashboard and tools.

faqs.Title: Introduction: The Project Management Mindset
list: Evolution of the Project Management Institute
Three simulation practice tests of 200 questions each

faqs.Title: Creating a high performing team
list: Build shared understanding about a project

faqs.Title: Starting the Project
list: Determine appropriate project methodology/methods and practices
Plan and manage budget and resources
Plan and manage quality of products and deliverables

faqs.Title: Doing the work
list: Execute project to deliver business value
Ensure knowledge transfer for project continuity

faqs.Title: Keeping the team on track
list: Address and remove impediments, obstacles, and blockers
Apply Emotional Intelligence to promote team performance

faqs.Title: Keeping the business in mind
list: Evaluate and deliver project benefits and value
Evaluate and address internal and external business environment changes

learning_overview_desc.description: Get an overview of the training structure, modules, and methodology for PMP Certification training by CertScope training solutions.

description: Project management disciplines
PMP® application and examination procedure
Project management tools like project cost estimating, work breakdown structure, Gantt charts, mathematical project scheduling models, resource allocation, cost management and engineering economics
How to sit through and clear the PMP® certification examination.

certificationSteps.title: Start by choosing the desired delivery method of training
certificationSteps.description: You can choose from the classroom, Live online or self-paced learning delivery options. Choose which suits your needs the best. Once you enroll, the relevant designated course adviser will guide you on how to get started with the training.

certificationSteps.title: Complete the required hours of training
certificationSteps.description: All the 14 chapters of official PMBOK-6th edition will be covered during the training. At least 35 hours of learning is mandatory as recommended by PMI USA.

certificationSteps.title: Download the 35 Contact Hour Certificate
certificationSteps.description: Once the training is over, you will have to download the 35 contact hour certificate or course completion certificate from the LMS or our 24/7 support team will issue the same. This certificate is mandatory to apply for PMP examination.

certificationSteps.title: Submit the application at PMI
certificationSteps.description: Once you receive the certificate, you will have to start the application process at www.pmi.org, Once you submit the application, it will take 15 days to review the application and receive the eligibility number which is used to schedule an examination.

certificationSteps.title: Schedule the exam at nearest prometric centre.
certificationSteps.description: Once you receive the eligibility number, you will have to sign up at prometric.com, which is a portal to schedule the exam at any of the nearby prometric centers. After the completion of the examination, results will be sent across via email within 15 days.

resource_desc: The Ultimate Guide to PMP Certification: Tips and Tricks
How PMP Certification Can Elevate Your Career
Roadmap to Success: PMP Certification Exam Prep

heading.title: CEH Certification

learning_overview_desc.description: Get an overview of the training structure, modules, and methodology for CEH Certification training by CertScope training solutions.

description: This ethical hacking certification verifies the skills required to thrive in the information security domain.
Key issues include plaguing the information security world, ethical hacking, information security controls, laws, and standards.
Perform footprinting and reconnaissance using the latest footprinting techniques and tools as a critical pre-attack phase required in ethical hacking.
Different types of malware (Trojan, Virus, worms, etc.), system auditing for malware attacks, malware analysis, and countermeasures
Social engineering techniques and how to identify theft attacks to audit human level vulnerabilities and suggest social engineering countermeasures
Session hijacking techniques to discover network-level session management, authentication/authorization, cryptographic weaknesses, and countermeasures
Penetration testing, security audit, vulnerability assessment, and penetration testing roadmap.

certificationSteps.title: Enroll for the course
certificationSteps.description: You can choose from the classroom, Live online or self-paced learning delivery options. Choose which suits your needs the best. Once you enroll, the relevant designated course adviser will guide you on how to get started with the training.

certificationSteps.title: Complete the Assignments given by the trainer
certificationSteps.description: Complete the 5 days live online training/online training or classroom training by the certified trainer..

certificationSteps.title: Access iLabs
certificationSteps.description: As part of the course, you are required to go through iLabs which will help you to gain practical knowledge of the domains.

certificationSteps.title: Appear in the exam
certificationSteps.description: Once the training and iLabs sessions are complete, you can schedule the exam as per your convenient schedule.

know_more_title.title: Know more about ITIL Foundation Certification program

steps.label: ITIL Framework
steps.description: The ITIL 4 Foundation certification introduces the ITIL framework and enables candidates to look at ITSM through an end-to-end operating model for the creation, delivery and continual improvement of tech-enabled products and services

steps.label: ITIL Foundation Overview
steps.description: The Foundation level is designed as an introduction to ITIL 4 and enables you to look at IT service management through an end-to-end operating model for the creation, delivery and continual improvement of tech-enabled products and services.

steps.label: ITIL 4 Certification Levels
description: There are four certification levels within the ITIL 4 scheme:
Foundation
ITIL 4 Managing Professional
ITIL 4 Strategic Leader
Master

learning_overview_desc.description: Get an overview of the training structure, modules, and methodology for ITIL-4 Foundation Certification training by CertScope training solutions.

description: A holistic approach to the facilitation of co-creation of value with customers and other stakeholders in the form of products and services
The guiding principles of ITIL 4
The four dimensions of Service Management
Key concepts from Lean, Agile, DevOps, and why these are important to deliver business value

How ITIL practices described in ITIL 4 will maintain the value and importance provided by the current ITIL processes, whilst at the same time expand to be integrated to different areas of service mana

certificationSteps.title: Choose the delivery method
certificationSteps.description: Choose your preferred delivery mode and complete the required training

certificationSteps.title: Take the exams
certificationSteps.description: There are two routes towards obtaining the ITIL Foundation certificate - you can sit the exams at the end of a training course with an Accredited Training Organization (ATO), or study privately and then book the exam without a training course via PeopleCert, our ITIL Examination Institute.

certificationSteps.title: Receive the Certificate
certificationSteps.description: Upon successful completion of the exam, you will get the result in a weeks time and certificate will be issued online.

certificationSteps.description: Write an online exam and score a minimum of  74% to pass the CSM® exam
